Description: Rim fragment of North Ionian hemispherical bowl; white slip; interior glazed with added red line lined in white; outside guilloche pattern, part in red, below band of verticals at lip.
Curator's comments: Close to 1924,1201.930, but the interior banding is at a different level.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.103)
